title: Handle a VIP Passenger
description: A VIP (e.g., a celebrity or high-profile government official) is traveling. Ground staff must provide special handling.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the VIP notification in the booking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is aware of the VIP's travel.

tasks.description: Arrange for a special services agent to meet the passenger kerbside and escort them through a private check-in and security line.
Allow the VIP to pre-board the aircraft before other passengers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent facilitates pre-boarding for the VIP.
